description.english: Use all 3 special types in a single stage
description.german: Verwende alle 3 Spezialwürfel in einer Stufe

description.italian: Utilizza tutti e 3 i cubi speciali in una stessa stanza

description.english: Earn a Gold Medal in every stage
description.german: Verdiene in jeder Stufe eine Goldmedaille
description.french: Gagnez une médaille d’or à chaque palier
description.italian: Ottieni una Medaglia d'oro in ogni stanza
description.spanish: Gana una Medalla de Oro en todas las etapas

description.russian: Заработайте золотую медаль на каждом этапе
description.japanese: 各ステージで、ゴールドメダルを獲得する

description.english: Match a cube at least 2 meters away from yourself
description.german: Kombiniere einen Würfel mindestens 2 Meter von dir entfernt
description.french: Associez un cube à au moins 2 mètres de vous
description.italian: Abbina due cubi a una distanza di almeno 2 metri da te
description.spanish: Combina un cubo a una distancia de al menos 2 metros de ti
description.schinese: 匹配一个离您至少2米的立方体
description.russian: Присоедините куб не менее чем в 2 метрах от себя
description.japanese: あなたから2メートル以上、離れたキューブをマッチさせます

displayName.italian: Non è proprio il suo posto

description.english: Throw a cube into the recycle bin

description.schinese: 向回收站扔出一个立方体
description.japanese: リサイクル箱にキューブを投げます

description.english: Match a cube that's been spit out of the recycle bin
description.german: Kombiniere einen Würfel, der vom Recycler ausgespuckt wurde

description.schinese: 匹配一个从回收站吐出来的立方体
description.japanese: リサイクル箱から吐き出されたキューブをマッチさせます

description.english: Complete Auditorium Recycling Bonus with 100% accuracy

description.german: Schließe Combo-Bonus in Bay 21 mit einer 10-Würfel-Multi-Kombi ab

description.english: Complete Rooftop Airborne Bonus without missing a single cube

description.spanish: Completa el Bonus Aerotransportado de la Azotea sin perder un solo cubo
description.schinese: 不错过每个立方体完成屋顶空运奖励
